column4: Hi, is it possible to customizemy desktop like those seen in the movies, or like in CSI miami. I just don't find anything on the web about it.
most if not all of the interfaces you see on tv exist only on tv...lol
except LCARS, now gnome can do LCARS
A complete makeover. I recently saw the desktop in the CSI miami, it's really cool, but what desktop environment do they run?
